BMW.3 Series: BMW 3 Series is a compact executive car.
BMW.5 Series: BMW 5 Series is a mid-size executive car.
BMW.7 Series: BMW 7 Series is a full-size luxury sedan.
BMW.X5: BMW X5 is a mid-size luxury SUV.
BMW.X7: BMW X7 is a full-size luxury SUV.

Mercedes-Benz.C-Class: Mercedes-Benz C-Class is a compact executive car.
Mercedes-Benz.E-Class: Mercedes-Benz E-Class is an executive car.
Mercedes-Benz.S-Class: Mercedes-Benz S-Class is a full-size luxury sedan.
Mercedes-Benz.GLE: Mercedes-Benz GLE is a mid-size luxury SUV.
Mercedes-Benz.GLS: Mercedes-Benz GLS is a full-size luxury SUV.

Lexus.ES: Lexus ES is a mid-size luxury sedan.
Lexus.GS: Lexus GS is an executive car.
Lexus.LS: Lexus LS is a full-size luxury sedan.
Lexus.RX: Lexus RX is a mid-size luxury SUV.
Lexus.NX: Lexus NX is a compact luxury crossover SUV.

Audi.A3: Audi A3 is a small family or compact executive car.
Audi.A4: Audi A4 is a compact executive car.
Audi.A6: Audi A6 is an executive car.
Audi.Q5: Audi Q5 is a compact luxury crossover SUV.
Audi.Q7: Audi Q7 is a full-size luxury SUV.

Jeep.Wrangler: Jeep Wrangler is a compact and mid-size four-wheel drive off-road and sport utility vehicle.
Jeep.Cherokee: Jeep Cherokee is a line of compact and mid-size SUVs.
Jeep.Grand Cherokee: Jeep Grand Cherokee is a mid-size SUV produced by the American manufacturer Jeep.

Land Rover.Discovery: Land Rover Discovery is a series of mid-size luxury SUVs.
Land Rover.Range Rover: Land Rover Range Rover is a luxury SUV.
Land Rover.Defender: Land Rover Defender is a model of off-road vehicle produced under this name by the British manufacturer.

Toyota.Land Cruiser: Toyota Land Cruiser is a series of four-wheel drive vehicles produced by the Japanese automobile manufacturer Toyota.
Toyota.4Runner: Toyota 4Runner is a compact, later mid-size SUV.
Toyota.Tacoma: Toyota Tacoma is a pickup truck manufactured in the U.S. by the Japanese automobile manufacturer Toyota.

Ford.Bronco: Ford Bronco is a model line of sport utility vehicles manufactured and marketed by Ford.
Ford.Explorer: Ford Explorer is a range of SUVs manufactured by Ford Motor Company.
Ford.Ranger: Ford Ranger is a range of pickup trucks manufactured and marketed by Ford in North and South America.

Ford.Mustang: Ford Mustang is an American car manufactured by Ford.
Ford.GT: Ford GT is a mid-engine two-seater sports car.
Ford.Shelby GT500: Shelby GT500 is a high-performance variant of the Ford Mustang.

Chevrolet.Camaro: Chevrolet Camaro is a mid-size American automobile manufactured by Chevrolet.
Chevrolet.Corvette: Chevrolet Corvette is a line of two-door, two-passenger sports cars.
Chevrolet.Chevelle: Chevrolet Chevelle is a mid-sized automobile which was produced by Chevrolet.

Dodge.Challenger: Dodge Challenger is the name of three different generations of automobiles.
Dodge.Charger: Dodge Charger is a model of automobile marketed by Dodge.
Dodge.Viper: Dodge Viper is a sports car manufactured by Dodge.

Pontiac.GTO: Pontiac GTO is an American automobile manufactured by Pontiac.
Pontiac.Firebird: Pontiac Firebird is an American automobile built by Pontiac from the 1967 to the 2002 model years.

Ferrari.488 GTB: Ferrari 488 GTB is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automobile manufacturer Ferrari.
Ferrari.812 Superfast: Ferrari 812 Superfast is a grand tourer produced by Italian automobile manufacturer Ferrari.
Ferrari.SF90 Stradale: Ferrari SF90 Stradale is a mid-engine PHEV (Plug-in Hybrid electric vehicle) sports car.

Porsche.911: Porsche 911 is a two-door, 2+2 high performance rear-engined sports car.
Porsche.Cayman: Porsche Cayman is a rear mid-engine, rear-wheel-drive 2-door 2-passenger high performance sports car.
Porsche.Panamera: Porsche Panamera is a full-sized luxury vehicle (F-segment in Europe) manufactured by the German automobile manufacturer Porsche.

Lamborghini.Aventador: Lamborghini Aventador is a mid-engine sports car produced by the Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini.
Lamborghini.Huracan: Lamborghini Huracan is a sports car manufactured by Italian automotive manufacturer Lamborghini.
Lamborghini.Urus: Lamborghini Urus is a high-performance SUV manufactured by Italian automobile manufacturer Lamborghini.

McLaren.570S: McLaren 570S is a sports car designed and manufactured by British car manufacturer McLaren Automotive.
McLaren.720S: McLaren 720S is a sports car designed and manufactured by British automobile manufacturer McLaren Automotive.
McLaren.GT: McLaren GT is a sports car manufactured by McLaren Automotive.
